markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Hippocampus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=697)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Living in the deepest reaches of the ocean, giant hippocampi haven't been sighted near the shore and are often regarded as legends made up by sailors.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Giant Hippocampus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=697)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 142 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent (imprecise) 30 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +14, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +20

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +4

**Con** +7

**Int** -4

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 170

**[Buck](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=6)** <actions string="Reaction" /> DC 28

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet, swim 80 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +18 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+10 bludgeoning

**Sudden Retreat** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The giant hippocampus makes a tail Strike, then [Swims](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) with a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its swim Speed. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-138" />
name: Giant Hippocampus

text: Giant Hippocampus Living in the deepest reaches of the ocean, giant hippocampi haven't been sighted near the shore and are often regarded as legends made up by sailors. Recall Knowledge - Animal (Nature): DC 26 Unspecific Lore : DC 24 Specific Lore : DC 21 Giant Hippocampus Source Bestiary 2 pg. 142 2.0 Perception +16; darkvision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet Languages Skills Acrobatics +14, Athletics +20 Str +6 Dex +4 Con +7 Int -4 Wis +4 Cha +1 --- AC 27 Fort +18 Ref +16 Will +14 HP 170 Buck Reaction DC 28 --- Speed 10 feet, swim 80 feet Melee Single Action tail +18 (reach 15 feet), Damage 2d6+10 bludgeoning Sudden Retreat Two Actions The giant hippocampus makes a tail Strike, then Swims with a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its swim Speed. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement.
